{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-10T17:51:23.000Z", "description": "

Mission Essential HCS is seeking a Junior Software Engineer for a full-time opportunity with our client in San Diego, CA.


Responsibilities:

  • Participating in the full software development cycle starting from requirement identification
  • Performing software and API design for upcoming release features
  • Coding and testing of assigned release features
  • Leading system and subsystem integration of new release features
  • Assisting in software defect triage and resolution


Requirements:

  • Bachelors degree in computer engineering or computer science or equivalent
  • 3 Years of experience as a software developer (design, coding, and testing) in commercial environment from requirements identification to deployment
  • 3+ years of solid C and C++ Programming, including strong Object Oriented Design principles
  • Proactive candidate with excellent oral and written communication skills, and the ability to provide direction or training to other team members
